amendatorysection.catchline: Violation; unfair trade practice; commission; powers.
amendatorysection.para: Violation of any provision of sections 76-2401 to 76-2430 by a licensee shall constitute an unfair trade practice pursuant to section 81-885.24 for which the commission may investigate and take administrative action against the licensee pursuant to the Nebraska Real Estate License Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Real Estate License Act, see section 81-885.
